text: Bruno Barabani is a retired weightlifter from Brazil. Barabani competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics, the 1956 Summer Olympics and the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born on 26 July 1932 and died on 28 March 2015.Bruno Barabani == References == Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian weightlifters Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from SÃ£o Paulo
